original_text: Not a man remained in Ai or Bethel who did not go after Israel. They left the city open and went in pursuit of Israel.
korean_text: 아이와 벧엘에 이스라엘을 따라가지 아니한 자가 하나도 없으며 성문을 열어 놓고 이스라엘을 추격하였더라

sentences.original_text: Not a man remained in Ai or Bethel
who did not go after Israel
and went in pursuit of Israel
